content.raw:
The UNIT_Rand_TEST is failing on osx. It seems that setting the random seed is not giving the expected random number ([src/Rand_TEST.cc:48](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign_math/src/ee8d2607413dfde48e6639bbd2387a7d3cacdcf7/src/Rand_TEST.cc?at=api_updates#cl-48)):
~~~
[ RUN      ] RandTest.Rand
/Users/scpeters/ws/ignition/src/ign_math/src/Rand_TEST.cc:48: Failure
The difference between d and 4.72597 is 9.1128212257392374, which exceeds 1e-5, where
d evaluates to -4.3868512257392371,
4.72597 evaluates to 4.7259700000000002, and
1e-5 evaluates to 1.0000000000000001e-05.
[  FAILED  ] RandTest.Rand (0 ms)
~~~
content.html:
The UNIT_Rand_TEST is failing on osx. It seems that setting the random seed is not giving the expected random number (src/Rand_TEST.cc:48):

[ RUN      ] RandTest.Rand
/Users/scpeters/ws/ignition/src/ign_math/src/Rand_TEST.cc:48: Failure
The difference between d and 4.72597 is 9.1128212257392374, which exceeds 1e-5, where
d evaluates to -4.3868512257392371,
4.72597 evaluates to 4.7259700000000002, and
1e-5 evaluates to 1.0000000000000001e-05.
[  FAILED  ] RandTest.Rand (0 ms)
